t: Amazon.com: Helen of Troy: CDs & Vinyl
s: Still have original LP... and do prefer sound quality. Yes extraordinary musicians lined up, powerful, bizarre, disturbing but, predictable. So, TOO perfect. Who cares, it is John Cale and one of the 3 or 4 best albums he made - one of the best albums ever. ... John Cale is a genius. Period. And on no albums was his genius-ness more prominent and seminal than on "Paris 1919" and the Island trilogy - "Fear", "Slow Dazzle", and "Helen of Troy...
